definition: Cantonese particle equivalent to 了[le5] or 過|过[guo4]
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: But someone set a goal and try his best to achieve it.
sentences.chinese: 而系，一个人定咗一个目标，并好努力咁去实现。

sentences.english: Then I put Taro Mori Kizu home phone addresses are copied to him.
sentences.chinese: 随后我把森木津太郎家嘅电话地址都抄俾咗佢。

sentences.english: Yes, I work hard for the exam.
Not only do I trust my friends, but I think I trust everyone pretty easily.
sentences.chinese: 除咗朋友之外，我都几相信其他人。

sentences.english: Sister is already dumb, and it still fails I eat Coptis?
sentences.chinese: 姐经已系哑巴咗，唔通还得食黄连唔成？

sentences.english: Miho gold I know for three years.
sentences.chinese: 我和金子美穗识得已有三年咗。

sentences.english: On a fine saturday we went to a park.
sentences.chinese: 喺一个晴朗嘅星期六我哋去咗个公园。

sentences.english: You must be very tired after working all day.
sentences.chinese: 你做咗成日嘢，一定好𤶊嘞。

sentences.english: If it worth money then we just take it from nature.
sentences.chinese: 有利用价值嘅就“攞”咗佢。

sentences.english: I also really friends when you cough.
sentences.chinese: 我都真嘅将你哋当朋友咗咯。

sentences.english: At present, I have already adopted two orphans.
sentences.chinese: 我依家助养咗两个孤儿。

sentences.english: I forgot to bring the Xerox of my passport.
sentences.chinese: 我唔记得咗带我本护照嘅复印件嚟。

sentences.english: It seems when you meet her again later, you should teach her English.
sentences.chinese: 睇落打后再遇到佢时，因乖先教佢英语咗。

definition: so (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 這樣|这样[zhe4 yang4]
old variant of 慨[kai3]/to sigh (with emotion)
to be at, in or on (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 在[zai4]
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)
(literary) to wipe away (tears)/to press with one's fingers/to soak
to know/to reprimand/to urge/to long for/to tell/to inform
to look down upon (classical)/to see/to look at (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 看[kan4]
what? (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]
